name: test_e2e_with_logs[072_XSS_DOM_007]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_DOM_007` |
| **Name** | Window.location DOM XSS |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | dom_xss |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `window.location='javascript:alert("DOM")'`
- **Encoded**: `window.location%3D%27javascript%3Aalert%28%22DOM%22%29%27`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results
